mhframework.io.net.client

Class MHAbstractClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • mhframework.io.net.client.MHAbstractClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MHNetworkClient

    public abstract class MHAbstractClient
extends java.util.Observable
    Abstract class for deriving network clients. The only abstract method in this class is sendMessage(), which may be overridden to work with TCP, UDP, or local method calls.

    For example, MHClientModule extends this class and provides a concrete implementation of a TCP network client.

    Author:
    Michael Henson
